annonstext:
At Tink, we’re creating the foundations that a new world of finance will be built on. By constantly challenging ourselves to go further and do better, we’re developing the ground-breaking services that businesses will use, to revolutionise the way millions of people manage their money. The world of financial services is changing fast, and we will continue to be at the forefront of it.

We are looking for a highly skilled Accountant to join and develop the growing finance function at Tink where you will play an important role by supporting our international expansion.

You will be located at our HQ in central Stockholm where you will be joining a finance team of +5 employees to hands-on manage the group’s finances with everything from general ledger bookings to producing the annual report and to collaborating with and supporting our subsidiaries in their daily finance work. Tink group currently consists of 10+ subsidiaries globally and we believe you have an eye for detail and that you have proven hands on accounting experience with experience from working in a group context.

The Role

We’re looking for an enthusiastic Talent that enjoys working in a fast-paced environment who will be working with accounting.

This includes:

- General ledger bookings
- Verify, allocate, post and reconcile transactions
- Tracking income and expenses
- Paying bills and perform invoicing
- VAT and tax reporting
- Actively participating in month-end and year-end reporting and close.
- Work with subsidiaries across the Tink Group to ensure smooth, aligned and correct group reporting.
- Supporting ad hoc requirements from both within Finance and other parts of Tink

This is a hands-on role in a rapidly growing company which would be an ideal move for a person who has a drive to continually improve and want to support Tink’s growth.

You have

- A degree within Business Administration & Economics (or similar)
- +3 years proven accounting experience
- Attention to detail that honours high quality standards
- The ability to self-manage, structure and adapt to changes in an entrepreneurial environment
- Experience from working in a group context i.e. managing multiple companies, currencies and dependencies
- A social personality and strong communication skills
- Fluent in English and Swedish, both written and verbal
- Professional user of MS Excel and Office
- It’s a plus if you have experience from working in Netsuite

Life at Tink

In an environment that’s filled with skilled and creative colleagues, and a culture that encourages people to make their ideas happen, you can have an impact like nowhere else. We all help each other to build new skills and best practices through the diversity of our backgrounds and opinions - while having a lot of fun in the process. Do you want to be part of our story and join one of the leading fintechs in Europe?

We're looking forward to your application!
